title: Africa: Covid Barely Gets a Mention These Days - Here's Why That's a Dangerous Situation
description: [The Conversation Africa] The United States experienced its second largest COVID wave of the pandemic in January 2024. For the year to December 2023, in England COVID rates peaked at around one in 24 people. During the same month, Singapore also experienced record COVID cases and a spike in hospitalisations.

title: Africa: Namibia Record Shock 1-0 Victory Over Tunisia
description: [Daily Trust] Namibia winger Deon Hotto scored in the 88th minute to hand them a shock 1-0 victory over Tunisia at the Africa Cup of Nations on Tuesday and keep up the sequence of surprise results that have dominated the opening days of the tournament.

title: Africa: Traore Scores to Hand Burkina Faso Late Win
description: [Daily Trust] Burkina Faso scored late to get all three points against Mauritania in the opening game of the TotalEnergies CAF Africa Cup of Nations Côte d'Ivoire 2023.

title: Africa: Super Eagles Look Forward to 'Interesting Encounter' With Elephants
description: [Daily Trust] Three-time African champions, the Super Eagles of Nigeria have said they have long concluded a diagnosis of Sunday's 1-1 draw with neighbours Equatorial Guinea and looking very much forward to what they believe will be an 'interesting encounter' with host nation Cote d'Ivoire at the 34th Africa Cup of Nations on Thursday.

title: Africa: I Was Emotional Watching Yusuf Against Equatorial Guinea - Mohammed
description: [Daily Trust] The Chairman of the FCT Football Association (FCT FA), Alhaji Adam Moukar Mohammed, has said he became emotional when watching the excellent performance of his ward, Alhassan Yusuf Abduallhi, against Equatorial Guinea on Sunday.

title: Africa: Afcon 2023 - Eagles Vow to Perform Better Against Hosts, Cote d'Ivoire
description: [Leadership] Nigeria's Super Eagles said they have put behind them the Sunday's 1-1 draw with Equatorial Guinea and are looking forward to what they believe will be an 'interesting encounter' with host nation Cote d'Ivoire on Thursday.

title: Africa: Can South Sudan Meet Its Election Deadline This Time?
description: [ISS] Missed peace agreement targets and poor election preparations could result in a disputed election or another extension.

title: Africa: 2023 Africa Cup of Nations - 5 Things We Learned On Day 4 - Don't Be a Big Team
description: [RFI] The likes of Nigeria, Algeria, Egypt and Ghana and Cameroon haven't been able to dispose of supposedly inferior teams in their opening round of matches. Tunisia went full immersion in the emulation.

title: Africa: An Ancient System That Could Bring Water to Dry Areas
description: [The Conversation Africa] Some of Africa's dry areas face serious water shortages due to minimal rainfall. An ancient system of drawing water from aquifers, the "qanat system", could help. Gaathier Mahed, an environmental scientist and expert on the management of groundwater, has studied the feasibility of these systems. He tells us more.

title: Africa: New Era - Unlocking Africa's Agriculture Potential Through CGIAR TAAT Model
description: [IPS] Nairobi -- As hunger and food insecurity deepen, Africa is confronting an unprecedented food crisis. Estimates show that nearly 282 million people on the continent, or 20 percent of the population, are undernourished. Numerous challenges across the African continent threaten the race to achieve food security; research and innovative strategies are urgently needed to transform current systems as they are inadequate to address the food crisis.

title: Africa: Dreadful Afcon Start for Bafana Bafana
description: [Scrolla] Percy Tau missed a penalty as Bafana Bafana went down 2-0 to Mali in their Africa Cup of Nations Group E opener at Stade Amadou Gon Coulibaly on Tuesday.

title: Africa: The Best African Books of 2023
description: [African Arguments] Once more, African writers from the continent and diaspora have provided us some literary gems. Our top novels of 2023, in no particular order.
